code: import React from'react';import{AppBar,Box,Toolbar,Typography,Button}from'@mui/material';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import{getToken}from'../services/LocalStorage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const token=getToken('token');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{flexGrow:3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppBar,{position:"static",sx:{color:'white',backgroundColor:'navy'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Toolbar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{fontSize:"22px",fontFamily:"forte",component:"div",sx:{flexGrow:2},children:"Authentication"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{component:NavLink,to:"/LogReg",style:_ref=>{let{isActive}=_ref;return{backgroundColor:isActive?'white':'',color:isActive?'black':''};},sx:{color:'white',fontFamily:'serif',fontSize:'20px',textTransform:'none'},children:"Sign-in "}),token&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{component:NavLink,to:"/dashboard",style:_ref2=>{let{isActive}=_ref2;return{backgroundColor:isActive?'white':'',color:isActive?'black':''};},sx:{color:'white',fontFamily:'serif',fontSize:'20px',textTransform:'none'},children:"Dashboard"})]})})});};export default Navbar;
